alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 2:27AM MST until December 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 11 AM MST Friday. For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
